item.title: Alternative Facts
item.description: What does Puppet and alternative facts have in common? No, this is not some political rant about how real facts matter. This article is about sub-planting alternative puppet facts provided by custom external FacterDB facts. But first. What the hell are FacterDB facts? FacterDB facts are artisanal hand-made facter sets from real systems stashed into a filesystem based “database” and searchable via facts. Basically just run puppet facts and save them off into git to get an idea.
